job_tasks.phrase: Your work will help build and operate Dataiku Cloud, the Dataiku SaaS offering based on Dataiku's core product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and operating a software product (Dataiku Cloud), which falls under traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: The role consists in actively participating in the design and implementation of a SaaS portal associated with the managed service offering.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing a SaaS portal is a direct software development task, fitting the definition of building and integrating software.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop new features to provide the smoothest experience for users so that they can benefit the power of DSS in a few clicks on the online environment.
job_tasks.justification: Developing new features for a user-facing application is a fundamental software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Ease installation and lifecycle management of the DSS instances running on our infrastructure.
job_tasks.justification: Managing the installation and lifecycle of software instances is a software engineering task related to deployment and operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve the quality of the code to ensure high availability and low latency for the platform.
job_tasks.justification: Improving code quality for performance and reliability is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with other Dataiku services to provide a more customized experience for Dataiku Cloud users.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating with other services to enhance user experience is a software integration task.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as building and operating a SaaS platform, developing features, managing installations, improving code quality, and integrating services. There is no mention of AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, or any AI-specific specialization. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the responsibilities and technologies involved. It explicitly describes a full-stack software engineering role without any mention of AI/ML tasks, making the classification straightforward and highly confident.
